item.title: [delta, 317] hhheeeeeeellllllllllppppppp asap! [delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

  1. NPCHandler class, find
public double[][] drops = new double[3851][45]

Change the 45 to a higher number (Number divided by 3 is the allowed drops per NPC)

  1. Server class, find
public boolean checkHost(String host) {

In that method look for

banHost(

Remove that line.
